channel.title: Playing RS at school? and being on mopar?
channel.description: i dont see how people get the time to do this..

item.title: Playing RS at school? and being on mopar?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“Inching Away, post:12, topic:81483”]Here’s a way to get Administrator Access on a school computer…

Start up your computer and log in on safe mode. Log into the Administrators account and change the rights of the non-administrator account. Takes a couple of seconds.[/quote]
Not working on a Novell network…
Computer System on my school is too smart lol

Read full topic
item.source: Playing RS at school? and being on mopar?

item.title: Playing RS at school? and being on mopar?
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

download java (save the file set up in my documents) and they install it on the computer and save the files in my documents instead of program files…it works…i did it for my friend at school. well it was firefox. though it was cool. At my school they block saving files to the program files.

Read full topic
item.source: Playing RS at school? and being on mopar?

item.title: Playing RS at school? and being on mopar?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Why not just log into the admin’s account and set 10-20 passwords with randomizer to change it every 20-30minutes.
Its not very complicated, I did it. Then they brute forced the shit and got it back :\

Read full topic
item.source: Playing RS at school? and being on mopar?

item.title: Playing RS at school? and being on mopar?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Here’s a way to get Administrator Access on a school computer…

Start up your computer and log in on safe mode. Log into the Administrators account and change the rights of the non-administrator account. Takes a couple of seconds.

Read full topic
item.source: Playing RS at school? and being on mopar?

item.title: Playing RS at school? and being on mopar?
item.dc:creator: @Ancient_weed Ancient weed
item.description:
@Ancient_weed wrote:

lol i always go to the computer oppisite of the teacher lol. Oh and moparisthebest.org got blocked to I use Moparisthebest.net lol but moparisthebest.com is blocked to oh and thank for Ctrl+Alt+F4 if you know what i mean ~.^

Read full topic
item.source: Playing RS at school? and being on mopar?

item.title: Playing RS at school? and being on mopar?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

I can do anything since I beat my teacher lol,
I just play mopar and he doesnt watch the screen,
sometimes I shut down his pc which is on the same network, they’re stupid, most childeren got administrator acces on the school pc’s, but the teachers never lollol,
btw we use our own accounts on the pc’s on school, still I own my teacher lol

Read full topic

item.title: Playing RS at school? and being on mopar?
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

When you work at a do nothing job for your univeristy, such as Computer support desk, you find time to do pretty much anything on the computer, surprisingly you can still play with the ANSI.SYS, and config.SYS in windows to pimp your dos prompt.

mmmm do nothing university jobs <3
